/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of blue and green. The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes Beijing.
